name: Textile Import House
unlockCondition: 20,000,000 ducats total wealth, Cloth Guild membership
calculationsAnalysis: The Textile Import House represents specialized infrastructure for high-value fabric trade. The construction cost of 4,000,000 ducats reflects the specialized storage and display facilities required, while the income of 50,000 ducats (1.25% return) represents the premium handling fees for valuable textiles. The maintenance cost of 30,000 ducats (60% of income) balances profitability with the reality of maintaining specialized climate-controlled storage. The employment capacity of 25 represents the specialized staff needed to handle, assess, and market valuable fabrics. The construction time of 9 days (777600000ms) represents a significant specialized construction project.
shortDescription: Specialized facility for importing, storing, and trading fine textiles from around the world.
fullDescription: Supporting Venice's renowned textile industry, these specialized facilities handle imported fabrics from across Europe, North Africa, and Asia. Featuring climate-controlled storage to prevent damage from humidity, specialized display areas with optimal lighting, and secure vaults for the most valuable silks and brocades, these buildings employ fabric experts who can assess quality and authenticity. The substantial security measures reflect the extraordinary value of fine textiles, which often represented significant wealth in Renaissance society.
